publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1944 Cathie Craigie: Volunteers’ Week 2008—That the Parliament notes that Volunteers’ Week in Scotland is taking place from 1 to 7 June 2008; thanks volunteers across Scotland for their hard work and contribution to local communities like Cumbernauld and Kilsyth; welcomes new volunteers who will be joining committed people helping others in all walks of life, and praises the important contribution that volunteers make to Scottish life and communities every day of the year.

S3M-1944 Volunteers’ Week 2008 (lodged on 20 May 2008) Roseanna Cunningham*, Bill Butler*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Stuart McMillan*, Marlyn Glen*, Sandra White*, John Park*, Patrick Harvie*, Bill Kidd*, Karen Whitefield*, Hugh O’Donnell*, John Wilson*, Elaine Murray*, Claire Baker*, Christine Grahame*, Cathy Peattie*, Alex Neil*, Paul Martin*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Robin Harper*, Patricia Ferguson*, George Foulkes*, John Lamont*, James Kelly*, Kenneth Gibson*, Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Johann Lamont*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie Hepburn*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*

S3M-1944 Cathie Craigie: Volunteers’ Week 2008—That the Parliament notes that Volunteers’ Week in Scotland is taking place from 1 to 7 June 2008; thanks volunteers across Scotland for their hard work and contribution to local communities like Cumbernauld and Kilsyth; welcomes new volunteers who will be joining committed people helping others in all walks of life, and praises the important contribution that volunteers make to Scottish life and communities every day of the year. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Bill Butler, Malcolm Chisholm, Stuart McMillan, Marlyn Glen, Sandra White, John Park, Patrick Harvie, Bill Kidd, Karen Whitefield, Hugh O’Donnell, John Wilson, Elaine Murray, Claire Baker, Christine Grahame, Cathy Peattie, Alex Neil, Paul Martin, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Robin Harper, Patricia Ferguson, George Foulkes, John Lamont, James Kelly, Kenneth Gibson, Elizabeth Smith, Nanette Milne, Johann Lamont, Alasdair Allan, Jamie Hepburn, Rob Gibson, Bob Doris, Dr Richard Simpson*, Brian Adam*, Trish Godman*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mary Mulligan*, Gil Paterson*, Aileen Campbell*, Tricia Marwick*, Irene Oldfather*, Jack McConnell*, David Whitton*
S3M-1944 Volunteers’ Week 2008 (lodged on 20 May 2008) Elaine Smith*, Margaret Curran*, Mary Scanlon*
S3M-1944 Volunteers’ Week 2008 (lodged on 20 May 2008) Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-1944 Volunteers’ Week 2008 (lodged on 20 May 2008) Ken Macintosh*, Peter Peacock*, Rhoda Grant*, David Stewart*
